aboutMePage.title: About me
aboutMePage.paragraph_one: I'm a highly motivated front-end developer and always looking to learn new technologies. I have solid experience in React, React Native and Next.js, and I'm always available to face new challenges and improve my skills. I have a passion for creating amazing, responsive user interfaces, and I enjoy working on challenging problems. Furthermore, I am able to work effectively in a team and communicate clearly with other team members. I am always willing to learn and adapt to new situations, making me a flexible and reliable developer for any project.
aboutMePage.paragraph_two: I have greater aptitude for the Front-end area, with solid knowledge in the stack: React.Js, Next.Js, HTML, Css and Styled components.
aboutMePage.paragraph_three: Bachelor in Information Systems from Centro Universitário Maurício de Nassau, with graduation completed in the first half of 2021. I worked for 9 years at Claudino S/A, in which 8 years were in the administrative area and 1 year in the company's IT sector , more specifically in the team responsible for the company's Ecommerce, where I carry out daily maintenance or development of new functionalities that use the technologies: Python, Django, Django REST Framework, React.js, Next.Js and PostgreSQL.

github_card.bio: Fullstack developer with more experience in the Javascript stack, Node.js, React, React Native and Next.js.

stats.stat_1: 5+ years of experience in the technology market

portifolioPage.title: Portfolio
portifolioPage.subtitle: Browse and learn more about my study projects and work carried out

id_1.title: AUTOMATIC IRRIGATION SYSTEM
id_1.description: Implementation of an artificial intelligence algorithm, known as fuzzy algorithm (or fuzzy logic) that uses the jFuzzyLogic library. In this implementation, artificial intelligence is used so that depending on the current situation of three aspects, which are: temperature, luminosity and humidity, there is automatic activation of an irrigation system for agricultural crops.

id_2.title: DEVRADAR
id_2.description: Application resulting from the week Omnistack #10 by Rocketseat. The application aims to connect developers close to your current location and working with the same technologies.

id_3.title: BE THE HERO
id_3.description: Application resulting from Rocketseat's Omnistack #11 week. The application is a way to connect people to NGOs that need some kind of help.

id_4.title: INTEGRA API WRAPPER
id_4.description: Node.js server for using the Inthegra API provided by STRANS from Teresina - PI.

id_5.title: LETMEASK
id_5.description: Application resulting from Rocketseat's Next Level Week #06. The application provides an environment where the user can log in using his Google account and create rooms on subjects of interest for other users to create questions.

id_6.title: PLANTMANAGER
id_6.description: Application resulting from Rocketseat's Next Level Week #05. The application provides an irrigation scheduler for your plants, giving tips on each species, as well as the best irrigation schedules. The app displays a push notification whenever it's time to water your plant.

id_7.title: NPS SURVEY SYSTEM
id_7.description: Application resulting from Rocketseat's Next Level Week #04. The application allows calculating the company's NPS (Net Promoter Score) through satisfaction surveys sent to users by email.

id_8.title: FASTTRACK API
id_8.description: Backend of a Node.js server that provides a REST API that allows sharing the smartphone's geolocation to a cloud database maintained by MongoDB.

id_9.title: INTHEGRE-SE APP
id_9.description: Application that monitors the public bus fleet in the city of Teresina - PI, and displays on a map the current location of each bus in activity at the moment, with intervals of 30 seconds between each position update.

id_10.title: RADAR POSITION CRAWLER
id_10.description: Study of the BeautifulSoup library that, used with the Python programming language, makes it possible to collect data from websites. This algorithm searches the website of Teresina City Hall - PI and provides the download link of the current position of speed cameras in the city.

id_11.title: PORTFOLIO PAGE
id_11.description: Personal portfolio page, built using React.js, Next.js, Styled Components and hosted on the Vercel platform.

id_12.title: LOGISTICS INFORMATION AGGREGATE
id_12.description: System to aggregate the company's internal logistic information.

id_13.title: LOGISTICS INFORMATION AGGREGATOR API
id_13.description: API written in Javascript/Node.js and hosted on an EC2 server on AWS to provide the company's internal logistical information.

id_14.title: BYTEBANK
id_14.description: App resulting from Alura's Flutter track. Using Flutter to generate the cross-platform application, this application serves to register account numbers and their respective values ​​to be recorded in dynamic states for display in the app.

id_15.title: WEB CALCULATOR
id_15.description: Web application of a calculator, written with typescript and using the Svelte Framework/Compiler.

id_16.title: LAYOUT MATERIAL DESIGN
id_16.description: Boilerplate structure for an application using the Material UI frontend framework.

id_17.title: RN MAPS
id_17.description: Small test application that uses the React Native framework to build a map view using the Google Maps SDK.

id_18.title: RN E-COMMERCE UI
id_18.description: UI that mimics some existing components, pages and dynamics in native mobile apps for e-commerce.

id_19.title: FIREBASE API BOILERPLATE
id_19.description: Boilerplate structure that integrates a CRUD in the Firestore database using firebase API.

id_20.title: MATERIAL V6 DASH
id_20.description: App boilerplate structure that uses the Material UI framework in version 6.

id_21.title: GLOBAL STATE MANAGER
id_21.description: Implementation study of the Zustand and Jotai libs to manage the global states of the web application.

id_22.title: CÉDULA PROMOTORA
id_22.description: Landing page of Cédula Promotora, a payroll loan company.

id_23.title: PRÓDOS DIGITAL
id_23.description: Landing page of PRÓDOS DIGITAL, a software development and digital marketing company.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Here are some of the most frequently asked questions about my software development services

questions.question: How long does it take to develop custom software?
questions.answer: The development time varies depending on the complexity and scope of the project. Simple projects may take 4 to 6 weeks, while more complex solutions can take several months. During our initial consultation, I can provide a more accurate estimate based on your needs.

questions.question: What is the process for developing custom software?
questions.answer: The process generally follows these steps: initial consultation, requirement definition, interface design, development, testing, and launch. After the launch, I provide support and maintenance to ensure everything runs smoothly.

questions.question: Do you provide maintenance and support after the project delivery?
questions.answer: Yes, I offer support and maintenance to ensure the software continues to function correctly. We can discuss ongoing maintenance packages or on-demand support.

questions.question: Can I track the progress of my project?
questions.answer: Yes, I maintain regular communication with clients throughout the project. I use project management tools for frequent updates and hold meetings to discuss progress and any necessary adjustments.

questions.question: What are the costs involved in developing custom software?
questions.answer: The cost depends on the complexity of the project, the desired features, and the time needed for development. After discussing your requirements, I will provide a detailed cost estimate.

questions.question: Do you work with user interface (UI) design and user experience (UX)?
questions.answer: Yes, I believe a good interface and an intuitive user experience are crucial for software success. I focus on UI/UX design with an emphasis on usability and user satisfaction.

questions.question: Do you offer consulting services before starting development?
questions.answer: Yes, I offer consulting to better understand your needs and help define the project requirements. This phase is essential to ensure all important details are covered.

questions.question: Can you integrate the software with other platforms or systems?
questions.answer: Yes, I develop solutions that can integrate with other platforms or systems, such as databases, third-party services, APIs, and more. Integrations are planned according to the specific needs of the project.

questions.question: Will the software be responsive and optimized for mobile devices?
questions.answer: Yes, all the software I develop is optimized to work well on various devices, including desktops, tablets, and smartphones, ensuring a consistent experience for all users.

questions.question: What types of projects have you developed?
questions.answer: I have experience with a wide range of projects, such as e-commerce applications, content management systems, service booking platforms, data analysis dashboards, among others. You can check out examples of previous work in my portfolio.

questions.question: Can I request changes to the project during development?
questions.answer: Yes, but depending on the project's phase, changes may affect the timeline and budget. However, I am always flexible and work with clients to accommodate their needs as best as possible.

questions.question: Do you handle the launch and hosting of the software?
questions.answer: Yes, I can assist with the software launch and advise you on the best hosting options based on the scale and expected traffic of your project.

questions.question: Do you offer performance optimization services?
questions.answer: Yes, performance is a critical factor for any software. I optimize the code and structures to ensure the software is fast and efficient, even under load.

questions.question: Do you work with agile methodologies in development?
questions.answer: Yes, I use agile methodologies such as Scrum or Kanban to ensure collaborative and efficient development. This allows for regular reviews and quick adjustments as needed.
